name: ANC_DOCUMENT_PUBLISHER
description: Publishes a professional markdown proposal to the current Workspace Thread Notes (Doc Editor). Use this after generating the 'Pretty' summary in chat.

content.description: The Markdown content of the proposal.

title.description: The title of the document (e.g. 'MSG Ribbon Board Proposal').

examples.prompt: Publish this proposal to the workspace document.

setup_instructions: This tool requires a thread-id context which is automatically provided when called via @agent in a workspace thread.
